Intelligent Document Processing (IDP)

A guide to various forms and documents that can be processed using Intelligent Document Processing (IDP) technology, including online and paper forms, invoices, payslips, ID cards, emails, cheques, memos, and more.

Key Concepts:

  • FORMS IN INTELLIGENT DOCUMENT PROCESSING
  • USE CASES FOR IDP
  • DOCUMENT TYPES FOR IDP
